text:
No matter where in the world your or your customers devices are located, with Remote Access, you can access them when ever you want.

 

Architecture

The Remote Access Core uses the following generic and open protocol (developed at intesso):

https://github.com/intesso/public-server

https://github.com/intesso/hidden-server

 

The Service is then wrapped with a Security Layer, followed by the specific Functionality based on the customers needs.

 

Features

  • Secure Tunnel (SSH, SFTP)
  • Remote Update
  • Remote Debugging
  • Monitoring of remote Devices
  • Statistics / Analytics

 

Technology

  • node.js
  • ssh / http / JSON / ...
